name: Cash Cow DX
description:
Holy cow, it's all about the moooney!

Embark on an udderly jolly adventure to rescue Cash Cow's riches from the grasp of those sneaky Pig Pockets and reclaim what's rightfully hers! Get ready for a blast from the past with an 80s inspired arcade experience released 40 years late...


Cash Cow DX features…

- 5 multi-screen levels, bonus stages and secrets
- player speed selection: normal or turbo
- arcade, speedrun and marathon modes
- worldwide leaderboards
- delightful chiptunes by Vincent Verger aka Tuï

Tough as nails and no continues: are you ready?
